Text: Video Conference with Ross McIntyre Cc should have received an invitation through lotus notes which outlines the VC location for the conference call tomorrow It is schedule for pm UK time am Houston time Rosss background is from Investment banking ex Dresner bank he has a PhD in Mathematical and is currently with speedwell weather derivatives where he has been developing weather derivative pricing and portfolio optimisation tools which they have been marketing to endusers with weather risks The attached word documents are articles that he has written for publication regards Nick Mooney MCSdoc Analyticdoc PARdoc

Video Conference with Ross McIntyre Cc should have received an invitation through lotus notes which outlines the VC location for the conference call tomorrow It is schedule for pm UK time am Houston time Rosss background is from Investment banking ex Dresner bank he has a PhD in Mathematical and is currently with speedwell weather derivatives where he has been developing weather derivative pricing and portfolio optimisation tools which they have been marketing to endusers with weather risks The attached word documents are articles that he has written for publication regards Nick Mooney MCSdoc Analyticdoc PARdoc

EnronOnline and SFA requirements Cc Paul Simons has advised us that EnronOnline will need to include standard SFA language on each Home Page in the garden area where we are promoting the services of EnronOnline as we are offering a system which would allow a registered user to enter into financial products This would inculde the EnronOnline main Home page in addition to all the new URLs that we are setting up for the different markets Paul should be able to suppply theh standard disclaimner language required regards Nick Paul could you please send the standard language thate would be required to Dave Samuels

Enron Retirement PlanAll Some of your may already know and by the time you finish reading this all of you will know that I am after years leaving Enron After nine years with Enron in Europe working in Human Resources UK Gas Power Origination Weather Trading EnronOnline and now Enron Credit I have accepted an opportunity to move on to a new venture in the City I will be the CEO of the International Weather Exchange IWeXcom Limited which is a venture involving LIFFE Willis Insurance and Intelligent Financial Systems Limited which will provide data forecast research information services and a risk transfer marketplace for climatic risk I would like to thank all of you personally for making the time here at Enron so enjoyable and rewarding If you are in London this Friday I will be located in the upstairs bar at the Grouse Claret public house from pm and would be happy if you could join me for a farewell drink before my departure If you want to contact me you can reach me at home on new mobile and Office numbers are not known yet but if you would like them let me know and I will send them to you once I know them or use my personal email account Nick ondoncom Regards Nick

URGENT REQUESTwe have added some language to the basic customer letter for a mailshot to Coal clients Very Short notice this need to go out immediatley UK time Could you please give it a quick review to complete the loop Dave Forster Louise and all the UK guys have OKd it Cheers Nick
